item.description:
We don't have to sit indoors just because it's February!

So, depending on the weather conditions, we have three options for this day...

Skating on the pond and/or sledding on the hill at the Hoerman's!

Don and Sharon have both a great pond for skating and a good hill for sledding. If there's ice, we'll skate. If there's snow, we'll sled. If we're really lucky and there's both snow and ice, we get to do both! You'll have to bring your own skates, but Gloria says she has a collection of sleds to serve us all!

And Don says we can have a bonfire, so bring some marshmallows for the fire, and maybe a thermos of your favorite beverage!

Don and Sharon live in Hebron. Since this is a private home, you must RSVP for directions.


Option 3 or Plan B, whatever you want to call it...

If we're having a February thaw, Gloria will plan a hike and list the details back here a day or two in advance.
item.name: Outdoor Winter Fun
